name: Light
description:
First of all, the game art is a little rough and there is no sound effect, which is not very friendly to the player's experience. Therefore, I will optimize these aspects and bugs in the future. However, it depends on the sales volume in the early stage. If my expenses can be guaranteed, I will continue to update it. If you have any ideas and opinions, please send them to my email. I will respond positively and absorb your suggestions.

If you don't like this game, what should you do?
You can post bad comments in the steam comment area and submit a refund application to steam customer service
